verses.verse: Likewise this is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

In the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> shall they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>: and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> there shall he <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of it all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> there the <S%H451>rump<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>innards<s%>,

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3689>them<s%>, which is by the flanks, and the <S%H3508>membrane<s%> that is above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, it shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>:
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: it is a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>.

Every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> there it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

As the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H817>is<s%>, so is the trespass offering: there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for <S%H3548>them<s%>: the priest that makes atonement with it shall have <S%H3722>it<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that <S%H7126>offers<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%>'s burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, even the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall have to himself the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> which he has <S%H7126>offered<s%>.

And all the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> that is <S%H644>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven<s%>, and all that is <S%H6213>dressed<s%> in the <S%H4802>fryingpan<s%>, and in the <S%H4227>pan<s%>, shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s that offers <S%H7126>it<s%>.

And every food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H2720>dry<s%>, shall all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H376>have<s%>, one as much as <S%H251>another<s%>.
And this is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, which he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

If he <S%H7126>offer<s%> it for a <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, <S%H7246>fried<s%>.

Besides the <S%H2471>cakes<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

And of it he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> out of the whole <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and it shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s that <S%H2236>sprinkles<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> for <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> that it is <S%H7133>offered<s%>; he shall not <S%H3240>leave<s%> any of it until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

But if the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> be a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, or a voluntary <S%H5071>offering<s%>, it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7126>offers<s%> his <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>: and on the next <S%H4283>day<s%> also the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> of it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%>:
But the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And if any of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> at <S%H398>all<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted<s%>, neither shall it be <S%H2803>imputed<s%> to him that <S%H7126>offers<s%> <S%H6292>it<s%>: it shall be an abomination, and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> of it shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that <S%H5060>touches<s%> any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>; it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: and as for the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, all that be <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall eat <S%H398>there<s%>.

But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, that pertain to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> upon <S%H5315>him<s%>, even that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H2932>thing<s%>, as the uncleanness of <S%H120>man<s%>, or any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%>, or any <S%H8263>abominable<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H398>thing<s%>, and eat of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, which pertain to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> no manner of <S%H2459>fat<s%>, of <S%H7794>ox<s%>, or of <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or of <S%H5795>goat<s%>.

And the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the animal that dies of <S%H5038>itself<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of that which is torn with <S%H2966>animals<s%>, may be <S%H6213>used<s%> in any other <S%H4399>use<s%>: but you shall in no <S%H398>wise<s%> eat of <S%H398>it<s%>.

For whoever <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H929>animal<s%>, of which men <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> it shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Moreover you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> no manner of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, whether it be of <S%H5775>bird<s%> or of <S%H929>animal<s%>, in any of your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.
Whatever <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be that <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, even that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, He that <S%H7126>offers<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

His own <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, the <S%H2459>fat<s%> with the <S%H2373>breast<s%>, it shall he <S%H935>bring<s%>, that the <S%H2373>breast<s%> may be <S%H5130>waved<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: but the <S%H2373>breast<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>'.

And the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

He among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, that <S%H7126>offers<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, shall have the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> for his <S%H4490>part<s%>.

For the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from off the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, and have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> from among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

This is the portion of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, out of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H7126>presented<s%> them to minister to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office;

Which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H5414>given<s%> them of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H2708>them<s%>, by a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, of the food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and of the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>, and of the <S%H4394>consecrations<s%>, and of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>;

Which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> their <S%H7133>oblations<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.
